name: Aprilia RS660
description: Engine: 659 cc liquid-cooled, Power: 100 hp @ 10,500 rpm, Torque: 67 Nm @ 8,500 rpm, Transmission: 6-speed gearbox with slipper clutch and quickshifter, Fuel Capacity: 15 liters

description: Engine: 1099 cc liquid-cooled, Power: 220 hp @ 13,000 rpm, Torque: 127 Nm @ 10,500 rpm, Transmission: 6-speed gearbox with Aprilia Quick Shift (AQS) up/down system, Fuel Capacity: 18 liters

description: Engine: 999cc inline-4, DOHC, liquid-cooled, Power: 193 hp @ 13,000 rpm, Torque: 112 Nm @ 9,750 rpm, Transmission: 6-speed manual, Fuel Capacity: 16.5 liters

description: Engine: 1,170cc flat-twin boxer, DOHC, air/liquid-cooled, Power: 125 hp @ 7,750 rpm, Torque: 125 Nm @ 6,500 rpm, Transmission: 6-speed manual, Fuel Capacity: 20 liters

description: Engine: 998cc inline-4, DOHC, liquid-cooled, Power: 203 hp @ 13,200 rpm, Torque: 114.9 Nm @ 11,400 rpm, Transmission: 6-speed manual, Fuel Capacity: 17 liters

description: Engine: 998cc supercharged inline-4, DOHC, liquid-cooled, Power: 200 hp @ 11,000 rpm, Torque: 133.5 Nm @ 10,500 rpm, Transmission: 6-speed manual, Fuel Capacity: 17 liters

name: Alpinestars Supertech R
description: High-performance racing boots with replaceable toe sliders, micro-adjustable ratchet closure, breathable mesh interior, and biomechanical inner brace for ankle protection. CE-certified.

name: TCX S-Sportour Evo
description: Sport-touring boots with microfiber upper, elasticated front and rear padding, reinforced heel and toe, and CE EN13634 certification. Ideal for street and light track use.

name: Sidi ST Air Boots (Blue)
description: Track-focused boots with adjustable calf system, shock-absorbing heel cup, air ventilation system, and replaceable parts. Perforated for increased airflow.

name: Sidi ST Gore-Tex Boots (Black/Red)
description: High-protection sport boots with Gore-Tex waterproof membrane, ankle support brace system, replaceable sliders, and full-length zipper closure system. CE rated.

name: Sidi Fusion Short Boots
description: Mid-height street boots offering toe and heel reinforcement, replaceable sliders, breathable inner liner, and comfortable everyday usability. Great for commuters and casual riders.

name: Sidi ST Air Boots
description: High-performance track boots with perforated Lorica construction, ankle bracing system, and replaceable parts including sliders and shin plates. Designed for advanced riders seeking maximum protection and airflow.

name: RST Tractech Evo 3 Boots
description: Sport-styled boots built for track and street performance. Features include reinforced toe box, ankle protection, and a ventilated design for long ride comfort. CE certified for safety.

name: TCX RT-Race Pro Air Boots
description: Premium race boots with advanced torsion control, breathable microfibre upper, and aggressive styling. Ideal for professional riders and track day enthusiasts needing ultimate performance and ventilation.

name: MT Thunder 4 SV Solid Helmet
description: Affordable full-face helmet with aerodynamic design, internal sun visor, and enhanced ventilation. Ideal for urban riders and beginners seeking safety and style.

name: KYT NF-R Race Replica Helmet
description: Race-inspired helmet with aggressive graphics, aerodynamic profile, and excellent ventilation. Suitable for sport riders and track day enthusiasts.

name: Axor Apex Adventure Helmet
description: Dual-sport helmet combining off-road style with street practicality. Features include an integrated sun visor, aerodynamic peak, and wide field of view.

name: AGV Pista GP RR Carbon Helmet
description: Top-tier MotoGP-level racing helmet with full carbon shell, superior ventilation, and optical clarity. Built for professionals who demand the best in safety and performance.

name: Shoei Hornet ADV Helmet
description: Premium adventure helmet with lightweight shell, advanced ventilation system, and removable peak. Perfect for long-distance touring and off-road exploration.

name: Klim Krios Pro Helmet
description: High-end ADV helmet made with carbon fiber and Koroyd technology for impact absorption. Extremely lightweight and designed for serious adventure riders.

name: AGV AX9 Dual Sport Helmet
description: Versatile helmet for both on-road and off-road riding, with a lightweight carbon-aramid shell and excellent airflow. Great for adventure touring.

name: Alpinestars Supertech M10 Helmet
description: Carbon composite helmet offering top-tier safety and fitment. Designed for motocross and aggressive off-road use with adjustable features and high ventilation.

name: Bell Qualifier DLX MIPS Helmet
description: Sport-touring helmet equipped with MIPS technology for enhanced impact protection, photochromic visor compatibility, and a sleek aggressive design.

name: HJC CL-17 Graphic Helmet
description: Budget-friendly helmet with colorful graphics, ACS ventilation, and DOT/SNELL certification. A great entry-level choice for street riders.

name: Pinestar Textile Suit
description: Urban-styled textile riding suit combining functionality and aesthetics. Features include CE protection, weather-resistant outer shell, and breathable mesh zones. Ideal for city riders looking for a balance between protection and fashion.

name: Pink Track Suit
description: Bold and stylish one-piece leather suit designed for women. Offers full-body protection with CE-approved armor, aerodynamic hump, and stretch panels for race-ready mobility and comfort.

name: Velos Leather Racing Suit
description: Premium racing suit with aggressive styling and high-performance materials. Includes full-grain leather, ventilated panels, knee sliders, and a speed hump. Built for track enthusiasts.

name: White Phantom Suit
description: Sleek and futuristic all-white leather suit. Offers impact protection with armor inserts and reinforced seams. Designed for riders who want to make a bold statement on the road or track.

name: Blackout Full Leather Suit
description: Classic all-black leather riding suit with stealth aesthetics. Features ergonomic design, ventilated areas, and reinforced armor zones. A go-to for versatile street and track use.

name: Blue Storm Race Suit
description: Dynamic two-tone blue racing suit made from durable leather. Offers race-spec protection, aerodynamic hump, and articulated joints for maximum movement at high speeds.

name: Green Flash Leather Suit
description: Striking green-highlighted leather suit designed for visibility and performance. Equipped with full protection suite and strategic ventilation zones for track or canyon carving.

name: Ixon Vortex 2 Suit
description: High-performance racing suit from Ixon, built for professional track use. Features Kangaroo leather, integrated airbags (optional), and superior ventilation and protection systems.

name: Maxxis M6029 Touring Tires
description: Durable touring tires ideal for scooters and commuter bikes. Designed for long mileage and consistent performance in both wet and dry conditions.

name: Pirelli Diablo Rosso IV
description: High-performance sport tires for street and track use. Offers excellent grip, agility, and handling thanks to its dual-compound technology.

name: Dunlop Trailmax Mission
description: Adventure touring tires made for both off-road and highway performance. Offers aggressive tread for dirt and longevity for long trips.

name: Essex Hypersport Tires
description: Aggressive tread and cornering grip for sportbike riders who demand high-speed stability and performance on paved roads.

name: Michelin Pilot Power 2CT
description: Dual-compound tires offering an excellent balance of grip and mileage. Suitable for riders looking for sport performance with everyday usability.

name: Metzeler Sportec M9 RR
description: Engineered for supersport motorcycles with excellent wet and dry grip. Suitable for aggressive riders and corner carving enthusiasts.

name: Pirelli Diablo Supercorsa SP V3
description: Track-bred tires with race compound for superior grip at lean angles. Homologated for street use but built for track days.

name: Michelin Road 6
description: Sport touring tires with outstanding wet grip, durability, and comfort. Designed for long-distance riders and versatile road use.
